name: TBC
tagline: An independent, full-service ad agency and PR firm
description:
TBC is an independently owned, full-service ad agency headquartered in Baltimore. Thanks to the eclectic, talented group they’ve grown into a top-50 independent shop in the U.S., serving clients large & small. 
What they do is solve your communications problems—in whatever medium it takes to do the job, no matter what field you’re in. They listen and study until they find the right way to tell your story, in your voice and with your logo.
